TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AddingNewEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供資料給事件，表示加入至集合的項目。The class provides data for the event, which signals that an item is about to be added to a collection. 這個事件會讓程式設計師，在事件處理常式，提供新的物件設定的選項屬性到這個新的項目。The event gives the programmer, within the event handler , the option of supplying the new object by setting the property to this new item. 如果未設定這個屬性，集合通常會使用適當型別的預設建構函式來建構新的項目。If this property is not set, the collection will typically use the default constructor of the appropriate type to construct a new item. 在任一情況下，新的項目會加入集合。In either case, the new item will be added to the collection. 如果集合也會實作介面，加入項目將部份，等候後續 commit 或 rollback。If the collection also implements the interface, the item will be provisionally added, waiting a subsequent commit or rollback. 此事件常用的類別內的資料繫結案例，例如和。This event is commonly used in data-binding scenarios, within classes such as and . 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別來處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to handle the event. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 使用 Windows Forms BindingSource 自訂項目加入](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/VB/form1.vb#8)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 不使用參數來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using no parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式集屬性設`null`。The default constructor sets the property to `null`. 值是`null`表示，如果未明確設定此屬性中，集合會採用標準的步驟，以提供新的項目加入至本身。A value that is `null` indicates that, if the does not explicitly set this property, the collection will take standard steps to provide a new item to add to itself.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object newObject) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: An to use as the new item value.

summary.span: 使用指定的物件當做新項目，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified object as the new item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式屬性設`newObject`參數。The constructor sets the property to the `newObject` parameter. 可以加入至相關聯的集合，將此物件使用新的項目，除非事件處理常式更新此屬性。This object will be used as the new item to be added to the associated collection, unless this property is updated by the event handler.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ NewObject { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要加入至繫結清單的物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the object to be added to the binding list.

value.span: ，當做要加入至關聯集合的新項目。

span.span: The to be added as a new item to the associated collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`null`，它會指出這個集合是要採取的標準動作，通常會需要建立適當的型別使用其預設建構函式，並再將它加入集合的物件。If the property is set to `null`, it indicates that the collection is to take the standard action, which typically entails creating an object of the appropriate type using its default constructor, and then adding it to the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別來處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to handle the event. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 使用 Windows Forms BindingSource 自訂項目加入](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md).
